name: Blame Restarts
description:
Weekly Game Jam #WGJ Week 35 - "What's it do?"

The player is a combat driver with a TBI.  Try to navigate through levels while learning what the keys do.

This is my first gamejam submission, and ironically the first game I've "finished".  I wish I could have done more but times-up!

Special thanks to Machine for helping with artwork.
